mtree 0.1.1
  • Get started
  • Reference

Example mtree dataset.

mtree_input.Rd

Example mtree dataset.

data(mtree_input)

Format

A list of parameters to build a mutation tree.

Examples

data(mtree_input)
mtree_input
#> $samples
#> [1] "PD9193d" "PD9193e" "PD9193f" "PD9193g" "PD9193h" "PD9193i" "PD9193j"
